content: pattern created with row counter app open in the app positive potato by munchi8175 a super cute amigurumi potato with a positive message pattern informations glossary increase increase slip_stitch slip_stitch decrease decrease single_crochet single_crochet chain chain stitch st stitch repeat repeat pattern instructions list of materials for this pattern you will need worsted weight yarn 3 25 mm crochet hook fiberfill stuffing a pair of 5 mm safety eyes or embroidery floss to make eyes black yarn or embroidery floss for mouth an embroidery needle to weave in ends stitch markers optional but useful to mark the 1st stitch as we will be working the body in continuous rounds a cardstock tag approximately 1 25 high and 2 wide with a positive message on it and a small hole on each side *tip - a cricut can be useful here if you have one this pattern is written in us terms body row 1 working in magic_ring make 8 single_crochet 8 sts row 2 working in rounds 2 single_crochet in each st around 16 sts row 3 1 single_crochet in next st increase in next st repeat around 24 sts from row 4 to 9 1 single_crochet in each st around 24 sts at the end of row 9 fasten a pair of 5 mm safety eyes in between row 5 and 6 leaving a few stitches in between the eyes embroider a mouth in between row 6 and 7 using black yarn or embroidery floss row 10 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 sts increase in next st repeat around 32 sts row 11 1 single_crochet in each st around 32 sts row 12 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts increase in next st repeat around 40 sts from row 13 to 18 1 single_crochet in each st around 40 sts row 19 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts decrease over the next 2 sts repeat around 32 sts row 20 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts decrease over the next 2 sts repeat around 24 sts row 21 1 single_crochet in the next st decrease over the next 2 sts repeat around 16 sts at the end of this round stuff the body with fiberfill row 22 decrease over the next 2 sts repeat around 8 sts slip_stitch to the 1st st in the round and fasten_off leaving a tail for weaving in using the tail go over and under the stitches in the last row and pull the tail to close the hole weave in the end arms row 1 working into one of the holes on the side of the tag work 2 single_crochet chain 1 and turn 2 sts row 2 increase in the 1st st 1 single_crochet in the next st chain 1 and tutn 3 sts from row 3 to 6 1 single_crochet in each st across chain 1 and turn 3 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail for attaching arm to body
